views.markdown: Swipe up, down, or use the 3D press menu on the desktop icon to quickly access application data tools; this version has been fully translated and optimized by the site administrator, including added a simplified version for downgrading applications, added an option to swipe down to access the tool, added the ability to check the encryption status of applications, added an option to remove panel dividers, added the ability to start in safe mode by long-pressing the panel icon, modified the original uninstall feature to ensure a complete uninstall without retaining data, fixed the issue where cache clearing did not refresh the total data display, corrected the issue with incorrect information being copied when long-pressing on the “More Information” page, modified the data reset function to include the reset of folder data within the program group, changed the data size display to include folder data within the program group during data reset, resolved the issue where cache data and permission counts were not refreshed after resetting data, and fixed the inability to use data reset, permission reset, or uninstall functions on non-AppStore downloaded applications (now only disabled for system applications)
